thread.title: Podcast: John Clay, Mark Story and Jennifer Smith on UK football season so far
thread.title_full: Podcast: John Clay, Mark Story and Jennifer Smith on UK football season so far

title: Podcast: John Clay, Mark Story and Jennifer Smith on UK football season so far
text:
Order a reprint of this story 
Kentucky Wildcats head coach Mark Stoops hugged Kentucky Wildcats wide receiver Dorian Baker (2) as the University of Kentucky played Eastern Kentucky University in Commonwealth Stadium in Lexington, Ky., Saturday, October 03, 2015. This is in overtime college football action. UK won 34-27 in overtime. Photo by Charles Bertram | Staff HERALD-LEADER Buy Photo 
With Kentucky off on Oct. 10, Lexington Herald-Leader UK football beat writer Jennifer Smith joins Herald-Leader sports columnists John Clay and Mark Story to talk about the pleasant surprises and disappointments so far, then look ahead to the rest of the 2015 UK football season.
